snippet: The secretary of health and human services said there were hundreds of problems with the Affordable Care Act’s website, but she rejected calls to delay the law.
abstract: Kathleen Sebelius, secretary of health and human services, says that government needs to fix hundreds of problems with website for federal health insurance marketplace, but she categorically rejects bipartisan calls to delay parts of the new health care law.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of health and human services said there were hundreds of problems with the Affordable Care Act’s website, but she rejected calls to delay the law.

headline.main: Sebelius Rejects Delays to Get Time to Repair Problems at Health Site
headline.print_headline: Sebelius Rejects Delays To Get Time to Repair Problems at Health Site
